quotes.quote: And the crow once called the raven black.
If you have to eat crow, eat it while it's young and tender.
The crow bewailes the sheepe, and then eates it.
Crows will fight over a dead man's flesh and kill each other for his eyes.
The crow commands, the captive must obey.
A Crow is known wherever he is met by his beautiful white dress, and his tall and elegant figure; the greater part of the men being six feet high.
The wing of the Falcon brings to the king, the wing if the crow brings him to the cemetery.
We heap up around us things that we do not need as the crow makes piles of glittering pebbles.
If the crow had been satisfied to eat his prey in silence, he would have had more meat and less quarreling and envy.
There is a bird who by his coat, And by the hoarseness of his note, Might be supposed a crow.
Crows are incredibly smart. They can be taught five things on the drop.
Crows squawked raucously in the trees. It sounded like they were tearing something apart, something they didn't even want, just for the fun of destroying it.
The crow wished everything was black, the Owl, that everything was white.
When a crow says an intelligent thing, chickens may laugh at it. This is the laughing of the sand castles at the powerful waves!
As the crow flies a popular and picturesque expression to denote a straight line.
It is better to listen to a crow that lives in trees than to a learned man who lives only in ideas.
If men had wings and bore black feathers, Few of them would be clever enough to be crows.
The eagle never lost so much time as when he submitted to learn from the crow.
In many traditions, crows are messengers and close attention is paid to their actions.
The world is a nest of crows; some caw in praise, some caw in derision. But men should be above the reach of praise and blame.
I will make thee think thy swan a crow.
If you wish to upset the law that all crows are black, you mustn't seek to show that no crows are, it is enough if you prove one single crow to be white.
Maybe all crows were just creepy.
How much can a crown be worth, when a crow can dine upon a king?
Don't seem to he on the lookout for crows, else you'll set other people watching.
In order to disprove the assertion that all crows are black, one white crow is sufficient.
Crows pick out the eyes of the dead, when the dead have no longer need of them, but flatterers mar the soul of the living, and her eyes they blind.
The black crow thinketh her own birds white.
Nothing is unreal as long as you can imagine like a crow.
A crow, who had flown away with a cheese from a dairy window, sate perched on a tree looking down at a great big frog in a pool underneath him.
The crows maintain that a single crow could destroy the heavens. There is no doubt of that, but it proves nothing against the heavens, for heaven simply means: the impossibility of crows.
Crows are not always available to give warning.
To shoot at crows is powder flung away.
Angels and crows passed each other, one leaving, the other coming.
It is better to fall among crows than flatterers, for those devour only the dead. These the living.
